title: Engineering Service Type
description: Engineering Service Type codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: Engineering services involving the application of chemistry, physics, and biology to design, develop, and operate processes that transform raw materials into valuable chemical products.
Engineering services focused on the design, construction, and maintenance of infrastructure such as roads, bridges, buildings, dams, and water supply systems.
Engineering services related to the study, design, and application of electrical systems, electronics, and electromagnetism.
Engineering services focused on protecting the environment by reducing waste and pollution, developing sustainable solutions, and ensuring compliance with environmental regulations.

Engineering services concerned with optimizing complex processes, systems, or organizations by developing, improving, and implementing integrated systems of people, materials, information, equipment, and energy.
Engineering services involving the design, analysis, manufacturing, and maintenance of mechanical systems including engines, machines, and thermal systems.
Engineering services specializing in the analysis and design of structures that support or resist loads, ensuring buildings and other constructions are safe and stable.
Engineering services focused on the behavior of earth materials, including soil and rock mechanics, foundation design, and slope stability analysis.
